rukus.text: 35|15|ao mnoussa lok.  puok anak kuchea anak del trauvkar a l laoh  bamphot .  haey a l laoh mha mean leusalb  chea ti kaotasarsaer .
35|16|brasenbae trong mean chetnea  trong nung thveu aoy puok anak vineasa  haey trong nung bangkeut anak thmei tiet mk chomnuosa vinh .
35|17|haey rueng noh  kmean kar lombak champoh a l laoh laey .

35|18|haey anak del sang babakamm min ach ttuolobantouk champoh  babakamm robsa anakadtei ban laey .  haey brasenbae anak del mean  babakamm thngonthngor ampeavneav aoy ke chuoyrek pn babakamm robsa ke ku kmean  anaknea ach chuoyrek pn aveimuoy pi ke ban laey  tohbei ke chea sach  nheate nungoknea kadaoy .  tampit anak( mou ham meat) kreante chea anak  dasatuen promean champoh banda anak del kaotakhlach mcheasa robsa  puokke teang athrkambang  ning ban brate b tde sa la t bonnaoh . haey  anaknea del ban saamatakhluon( ampi ampeu shi ri k ning ampeuaeakrak) pit  brakd nasa  ke ban saamat samreab khluon ke phtal bonnaoh . haey  tow champoh a l laoh kuchea kanleng vilotralb chongokraoy .
35|19|haey anak del ngngutaphnek  ning anak del meulkheunh min smae  knea laey .
35|20|haey pheap ngngut  ning pheap mean ponlu min smae kmea laey .
35|21|haey kanleng mlob  ning kanleng kdaw ka min smaekna der .

35|22|haey anak del rsa  ning anak del slab ka min sae  m knea der .  pitabrakd nasa  a l laoh thveu aoy sdablyy champoh anaknea del trong  mean chetnea .  haey anak( mou ham meat) poum men chea anak del thveu aoy anak  del nowknong phnaur sdablyy ban laey .
35|23|anak( mou ham meat) poum men chea avei krawpi chea anak dasatuen  promean noh laey .

35|24|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban banhchoun anak( mou ham meat)cheamuoy  nung karpit  daembi thveuchea anak phdal damnoeng rikreay  ning chea anak dasatuen  promean .  haey real brachacheate ni muoy  ku tengteman anak dasatuen  promean towdl puokke .

35|25|haey brasenbae puokke bdeseth nung anak  ku pit nasa puok  chomnean moun puokke kaban bdeseth( nung banda anakneasar robsa puokke) der  khn del banda anakneasar robsa puokke ban neamk aoy puokke nouv  phosdo tang yeang chbasaleasa cheachraen  ning banda kompir( dauchchea saou ho hv  ai pr hi m) ning kompir da trachahtrachng( dauchchea kompir ta vr t  ning kompir  ainh chi l) .
35|26|kraoyomk yeung ban daktondakamm puok del brachheang .  dau che  neah  tae tearounakamm robsa yeung yeang dauch me  d ch der
